name: HarmoniAI
desc: LLM-powered mental-wellbeing chat with real-time streaming, conversation memory, and privacy-first storage.

name: SkipSense
desc: ML system that predicts track skips using audio spectrograms + listener metadata, powering a personalized “discover” playlist.

name: RaySimOpt
desc: Distributed simulation and hyperparameter optimization on Ray; orchestrates parallel experiments with reproducible configs to dramatically shorten iteration cycles.

name: Vehicost
desc: Vehicle total-cost-of-ownership calculator comparing fuel, insurance, maintenance, and depreciation with interactive scenarios.

name: MaskUP
desc: Uses video surveillance camera footage to capture images of people who are not wearing masks.

name: TutorialRoach
desc: Web app designed to encourage users to showcase their expertise. Uses Ethereum Smart contracts and CockroachDB systems.

name: myWaste
desc: Encourages citizens to be mindful how much waste is produced in the neighbourhood to maintain eco-friendly neighbourhoods.
